messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the spell on invisible things?
Makes visible magically invisible things
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does the effect of the spell last?
No more than ten heartbeats
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines the special ingredients in the powder?
The Keeper
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does the thing that is dusted stay visible?
ten heartbeats
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the powder in the spell?
The powder makes things visible that would normally be invisible.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does the visibility from the powder last?
The visibility lasts for no more than ten heartbeats.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary function of the ankh created by the spell?
It can temporally or permanently banish individual Mythos creatures.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What must the object be made of to function properly?
An unalloyed metal—pure copper, iron, silver, gold, or lead.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the required outcome for the spell to take effect?
The caster must succeed in an opposed POW roll with the target.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the bonus die the caster gains on the opposed POW roll if a certain number of magic points are spent?
A bonus die on the opposed POW roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition that increases the limitation of affecting beings of higher POW?
The caster may challenge a being with POW equal to his or hers plus 200.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the creature if the ankh-wielder and companions fail to dispel it?
It attacks the ankh-wielder first before turning its attention to others present.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition for a caster to challenge a being of higher POW?
The caster may challenge a being with POW equal to his or hers plus 200.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a creature if the ankh-wielder and companions overcome it?
It is dispelled to its home plane.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the Sigil of Banishment spell on victims?
It causes one or several victims to die horribly.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does the Sigil of Banishment spell's effect last?
The effect lasts for one round after its creation.
